alert.note: Alert for Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Mecklenburg, Union, northeastern Chester and York Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Monroe to 12 miles west of York. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Monroe, York, South Charlotte, Indian Trail, Weddington, Fort Mill, Stallings, Unionville and Pineville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
